titles.title: I Was There When It Happened

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I was there when it happened, newline And I ought to know, newline His Spirit burning in me, newline Set my heart aglow, newline So I praise the Lord today.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You ask me how I know that Jesus saves me, newline How I know that all my sins are white as snow. newline You ask me how I know that He forgave me, newline Now listen I must tell you how I know.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You ask me how I know that He redeemed me, newline And how I received the peace no gold can buy. newline How from the guilt and pow'r of sin He saved me, newline Made me an heir to mansions in the sky.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And now as thru the world I go rejoicing, newline I am telling what a Savior dwells within. newline How I plunged into the cleansing crimson fountain, newline And Jesus washed my soul from ev'ry sin.
